name: dim
description: Dim is an open-source personal media manager designed to organize local media files and tag them with metadata. It includes a responsive web UI and indexing support, tailored for use alongside tools like Jellyfin.
features: Media Organization: Tag and categorize local media files. Structured library management.
Metadata Enrichment: Automatic fetching of movie and show information. Beautiful library presentation.
Responsive UI: Browse your collection on any device. Access media anywhere.
Jellyfin Integration: Works alongside popular media servers. Enhanced media experience.
Fast Indexing: Quick scanning of large media libraries. Efficient processing.
Self-Hosted: Keep your media metadata private. Your collection, your control.
